attributes.action: Tackle human trafficking for the sex trade as opposed to criminalising prostitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Too much focus for prostitution is given to human trafficking.  Whilst this is a more than laudable cause it is being used to pander to the sensibilities of ignorant, backward-thinking and/or closed-minded politicians

Power should be given back to humans to use their bodies as they see fit and for the law to adequately protect them.  Legal 'brothels' should be established and health laws at said establishments be enforced for the health and well-being of patrons and workers
